title: Ayad Akhtar on Truth and Fiction
description: Akhtar discusses "Homeland Elegies," and Marc Lacey talks about "Cry Havoc," by Michael Signer, and "The Violence Inside Us," by Chris Murphy.
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
